com.att.api.aab.manager
Class AabManager

java.lang.Object
  com.att.api.aab.manager.AabManager

public class AabManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class encapsulates the AT&T RESTful APIs for AddressBook.

Author:
sm095n, ps350r

isCurrentTokenExpired

public static java.lang.Boolean isCurrentTokenExpired()
The AabManager internal method checks if the current access token is expired.

CheckAndRefreshExpiredTokenAsync

public java.lang.Boolean CheckAndRefreshExpiredTokenAsync()
The AabManager internal method automatically updates the current token using the RefreshToken.

getOAuthToken

public void getOAuthToken(java.lang.String code)
Gets an access token using the specified code.

The parameters set during object creation will be used when requesting the access token.

The token request is done using the 'authorization_code' grant type.

Parameters:
code - code to use when requesting access token

RevokeToken

public void RevokeToken(java.lang.String hint)
Revokes the current token.

Parameters:
hint - a hint for the type of token to revoke

RevokeAccessToken

public void RevokeAccessToken()
Revokes the access token.

CreateContact

public void CreateContact(com.att.api.aab.service.Contact contact)
Creates a new Contact which specifies AT&T Mobile Subscriber’s Contact data model.

Parameters:
contact - a new contact to be created

GetContacts

public void GetContacts(java.lang.String xFields,
                        com.att.api.aab.service.PageParams pParams,
                        java.lang.String sParams)
The Get Contact method enables retrieving all the contact information with some order and pagination criteria

Parameters:
xFields - Specifies field names that are expected on the response.
pParams - Pagination Parameters
sParams - Search Parameters

GetContact

public void GetContact(java.lang.String contactId,
                       java.lang.String xFields)
The Get Contact Id method enables retrieving the contact data structure via a contactId.

Parameters:
contactId - Specifies subscriber contact ID.
xFields - Specifies field names that are expected on the response.

GetContactGroups

public void GetContactGroups(java.lang.String contactId,
                             com.att.api.aab.service.PageParams params)
The Get Contact Groups enables retrieving the list of groups a contact is belonging to.

Parameters:
contactId - Specifies subscriber contact ID
params - Pagination Parameters

UpdateContact

public void UpdateContact(com.att.api.aab.service.Contact contact)
The Update Contact method updates a contact based on the provided contact data structure. The contact’s Id is a mandatory field in the request

Parameters:
contact - Specifies AT&T Mobile Subscriber’s Contact data structure.

DeleteContact

public void DeleteContact(java.lang.String contactId)
Contact identified by the contactId are moved to the trash.

Parameters:
contactId - Specifies contact id to delete

CreateGroup

public void CreateGroup(com.att.api.aab.service.Group group)
The Create Group method enables creating a USER group, if the subscriber’s address book did not reach its configurable maximum number of groups (configurable at the system level, 200 by default).

Parameters:
group - Specifies ATT’s subscriber group data model

GetGroups

public void GetGroups(com.att.api.aab.service.PageParams params,
                      java.lang.String groupName)
The Get Groups method enables retrieving the list of the subscriber’s groups

Parameters:
params - Pagination Parameters
groupName - Specifies group name.

DeleteGroup

public void DeleteGroup(java.lang.String groupId)
The Delete Group method enables deleting a list of groups.

Parameters:
groupId - Specifies group id to delete.

UpdateGroup

public void UpdateGroup(com.att.api.aab.service.Group group)
The Update Group method enables updating an existing USER group identified by its Group ID. group ID is mandatory in a group

Parameters:
group - Specifies the subscriber’s contact group object If group contains an empty name, this API will return an InvalidGroupException. If group does not contain a name, it will leave unchanged the name on the server side.

AddContactsToGroup

public void AddContactsToGroup(java.lang.String groupId,
                               java.lang.String contactIds)
This method associates a list of contacts to a group

Parameters:
groupId - Specifies the group identifier
contactIds - Specifies contact id’s to add. Note: Max 20 group ids are allowed to add.

RemoveContactsFromGroup

public void RemoveContactsFromGroup(java.lang.String groupId,
                                    java.lang.String contactIds)
This method will remove the association between the specified group and list of contacts.

Parameters:
groupId - Specifies the group identifiers
contactIds - Specifies list of contact id’s to delete. Note: Max 20 contact ids are allowed to delete.

GetGroupContacts

public void GetGroupContacts(java.lang.String groupId,
                             com.att.api.aab.service.PageParams params)
The Get Groups Contact method enables retrieving the list of contacts owned by a group. It takes a group identifier as an argument and returns a list of contacts.

Parameters:
groupId - Specifies subscriber group ID.
params - Pagination Parameters

GetMyInfo

public void GetMyInfo()
The "myInfo" URI enables retrieving the subscriber’s personal contact card. This personal contact card is called myInfo or my user profile and follows the contact data model.

UpdateMyInfo

public void UpdateMyInfo(com.att.api.aab.service.Contact contact)
The Update MyInfo method updates a subscriber personal profile MyInfo based on the provided contact data structure.

Parameters:
contact - myInfo -- Specifies AT&T Mobile Subscriber’s Contact data structure.
